code: import"antd/es/card/style";import _Card from"antd/es/card";import"antd/es/form/style";import _Form from"antd/es/form";import"antd/es/input/style";import _Input from"antd/es/input";import React from'react';import{usePageData}from'../../hooks/usePage';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";var TextArea=_Input.TextArea;var pageData={fulFilled:true,title:'Text Area',breadcrumbs:[{title:'UI Kit',route:'default-dashboard'},{title:'Components',route:'default-dashboard'},{title:'Textareas'}]};var TextareasPage=function TextareasPage(){usePageData(pageData);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"row",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"col-md-6 col-sm-12",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(_Card,{title:"Basic text area",className:"mb-md-0",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(_Form,{layout:"vertical",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(_Form.Item,{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(TextArea,{defaultValue:"With value",rows:3})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(_Form.Item,{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(TextArea,{placeholder:"With placeholder",rows:3})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(_Form.Item,{label:"Input label",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(TextArea,{placeholder:"With label",rows:3})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(_Form.Item,{extra:"Description",className:"mb-0",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(TextArea,{placeholder:"With description",rows:3})})]})})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"col-md-6 col-sm-12",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(_Card,{title:"Text area sizing",className:"mb-0",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(_Form,{layout:"vertical",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(_Form.Item,{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(TextArea,{defaultValue:"Fixed size",rows:5})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(_Form.Item,{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(TextArea,{defaultValue:"Default input",autoSize:true,rows:3})})]})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(_Card,{title:"Clear button",className:"mb-0",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(TextArea,{defaultValue:"With clear button",allowClear:true})})]})]});};export default TextareasPage;
